name: A Better Future
description:
The world has ended, and it has fallen to you to be the one to give mankind a new beginning. Sneak into the mega-corporate robot facility, steal the leftover scrap, and use them to build machines that breathe life into the world once more. 

A better world is a game made in one week for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1, with the theme "An ending is a new Beginning"

DISCLAIMER:
In the "full" version of this game, the level changed based on the machines you built, but due to build size restrictions those levels had to be scrapped. I am truly sorry, as It really added to the experience.

Controls:
Walk - WASD
Jump - Spacebar
Stealth/Crouch - C
Flashlight - F
Reset position (if stuck) - R
Quit game - Escape key
